attributes.action: Make false claims about serving in the armed forces a specific criminal offence
attributes.additional_details: The UK Government should make it illegal for a person to make false claims about serving in the Armed Forces. The crime should be punishable with a custodial sentence to prevent these individuals from making such false and misleading statements.
attributes.background: We think there is growing trend in the UK for individuals to claim they have served in the Armed Forces. These individuals undermine genuine current serving personnel and veterans.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/741677
